rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0001
rows.name: These hot springs bring back memories...

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0002
rows.name:
I came here the first time
we stayed in Superbia.

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0003
rows.name:
The water was amazing.
Washed away all your tiredness, right?

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0004
rows.name: Oh, so this is where you lodged.

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0005
rows.name:
First time here for me,
but from what I can see...

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0006
rows.name: Is this a mixed bath!?

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0007
rows.name:
Sadly no...
they switch between men's
and women's hours.

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0008
rows.name: Oh... that kind of system.

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0009
rows.name: Heh... how disappointing for you.

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0010
rows.name:
Since it seems to be men's bathing time
right now, let's all
go in together.

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0011
rows.name: What?

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0012
rows.name: How should I respond, meh?

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0013
rows.name:
Bonding between men
through nudity is important!

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0014
rows.name: I'll wash everyone's backs!

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0101
rows.name: The four of us here will enter together?

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0102
rows.name: Absolutely!

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0103
rows.name: Or, is there some problem?

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0104
rows.name: No, Rex and I are fine, but Meleph is...

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0105
rows.name:
You three should go ahead.
I'll have to decline.

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0106
rows.name:
Don't be so reserved!
Come on Meleph, let's go together!

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0131
rows.name: Hurry up!

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0132
rows.name: Don't resist!

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0133
rows.name: Hey, cut it out!

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0134
rows.name: Don't pull so much!

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0107
rows.name:
...Could it be that Tora doesn't know
Meleph is a woman?

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0108
rows.name:
Hmm, just like we can barely tell
male and female Nopon apart
except by their clothes...

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0109
rows.name:
Tora probably can't clearly
distinguish Meleph,
who is dressed as a man.

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0110
rows.name:
Or rather, he might not care
about it in the first place.

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0111
rows.name:
Meleph, buck up your courage
and join us!

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0112
rows.name: I refuse.

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0113
rows.name:
Many Nopon dislike baths,
so Tora understands.

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0114
rows.name: Does Meleph actually hate baths?

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0115
rows.name:
But you need to soak in
a proper bath sometimes
or you'll get all grimy!

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0116
rows.name:
I actually enjoy bathing and I maintain
perfect hygiene... but this time
I absolutely cannot join you.

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0117
rows.name:
Being so stubborn
with the hot springs
right in front of you.

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0118
rows.name:
A real man would strip down boldly
and cannonball into the hot spring!

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0119
rows.name: No... I'm a woman...

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0120
rows.name: Me...me...mehmehmehmeh?!

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0121
rows.name: A w-w-woman...?

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0122
rows.name: My gender is female.

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0123
rows.name: Meh-meh-mehmehh?!

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0124
rows.name: Boss! Zeke! Did you know!?

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0125
rows.name:
Well, it's pretty obvious
if you look closely...

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0126
rows.name:
This is the biggest discovery ever
for Tora!! I need to tell Hana and
the others right away!

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0127
rows.name: Well, I guess that settles it?

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0128
rows.name:
Good grief.
To think such a problem
would arise at this point.

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0129
rows.name:
Hey Meleph,
why not go all out and dress
like a princess instead?

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0130
rows.name: I refuse.

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0201
rows.name:
But in exchange,
please wash Tora's back too!

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0202
rows.name:
Tora has been yearning for physical
bonding between companions!

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0203
rows.name: I think I'll have to decline.

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0204
rows.name: You don't want to bathe with Tora?

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0205
rows.name: No, that's not the reason.

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0206
rows.name:
I just have my own reasons
for declining...

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0207
rows.name: Is it because Tora is Nopon?

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0208
rows.name:
No, of course not!
That's not it at all! It's just...
there are other considerations...

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0209
rows.name: Listen, Meleph...

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0210
rows.name:
Why be so difficult?
Why not just make the little guy's
simple wish come true?

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0211
rows.name:
Don't be ridiculous!
You're just getting a kick out of this!

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0212
rows.name:
Meleph... are you worried
about feathers floating
in the bath?

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0213
rows.name:
It's okay!
Tora is young,
so they don't fall out so easily.

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0214
rows.name: No, that's not the issue.

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0215
rows.name: Then perhaps... you dislike Tora?

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0216
rows.name: No! That's not true at all...

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0217
rows.name:
Meleph...
look how sad you're making Tora.

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0218
rows.name: Ugh[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0219
rows.name:
If you really don't hate me,
then please wash my back...

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0220
rows.name: Hmph...

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0221
rows.name: Alright... I'll join you for the bath.

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0222
rows.name: Huh?!

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0223
rows.name: Seriously?!

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0224
rows.name: Yay!

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0225
rows.name:
However,
I'll enter with my clothes on!
I won't accept any objections!

rows.label: kizunatalk027_msg0226
rows.name:
You know you're actually
supposed to be naked
in a hot spring, right?
